DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate feasibility effectiveness group contraceptive counsel family plan knowledge acquisition , service satisfaction , method uptake continuation among group resettle African refugee woman .
DOC.brief_title: Group Versus Individual Contraceptive Counseling Resettled African Refugee Women
DOC.detailed_description: Thousands woman refugee arrive United States year , yet little known reproductive health family planning need woman resettlement . This randomize control pilot study , population resettle African refugee woman , evaluate difference group individual contraceptive counsel decision use contraception , satisfaction counsel method , modern family planning knowledge . Participants arrive clinic assign `` intervention day . '' An intake exit survey perform counseling session . Demographics , attitude towards contraception , knowledge regard contraceptive method assess via questionnaire . Participants randomize either group individual contraceptive counseling . After session , participant option privately choose reversible method contraception free charge . Telephone survey follow-up participant occur every three month one year . Follow-up survey include question regard method continuation , method satisfaction modern contraceptive knowledge .
DOC.criteria: Resettled refugee Ability speak comprehend conversational Swahili , French Lingala Interest contraceptive counsel Willing adhere study protocol include randomization followup Cellular phone access Male
